Working Committee of the Central and State Organs of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party (; usually referred to as Working Committee of the Central and State Organs of the CCP Central Committee) is an agency dispatched by the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party, responsible for the work of the central and state organs of the CCP. It is mainly responsible for organizing, planning, and deploying the work of the CCP in central and state organs.
History
In March 2018, the responsibilities of the  and the  were integrated to form the Working Committee of the Central and State Organs of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party as part of the deepening the reform of the Party and state institutions.
